attributes.additional_details:
Our Government already receives massive amounts of money from the purchase of fuel & Road Tax.
The 20% VAT on repair bills adversely affects those who cannot afford to buy new cars therefore must maintain second hand, older cars in order to remain mobile, drive to work or use their work vehicle for business purposes.
This additional financial burden is increasingly the last straw for small businesses.
Keep Britain mobile & working!
SCRAP VAT ON CAR REPAIRS
